# style

**Instance Property**

The visual appearance of the place selection accessory.

## Declaration

```swift
get style(): PlaceSelectionAccessoryStyle;
set style(value: PlaceSelectionAccessoryStyle);
```

## Working with styles

- **PlaceSelectionAccessoryStyle**: The set of styles for configuring how a place selection accessory appears.
